title: #97: Dr. Kay Durairaj - Plastic Surgery, Preventative Measures, Ethics Between Surgeons, and Misconceptions Behind Plastic Surgery
itunes:title: #97: Dr. Kay Durairaj - Plastic Surgery, Preventative Measures, Ethics Between Surgeons, and Misconceptions Behind Plastic Surgery
description:
On this episode we sit down with Dr. Kay Durairaj. Dr Kay is a board certified facial plastic surgeon and specialist of head and neck surgery. She completed her surgical training at UCLA and is a member of the American Academy of Facial Plastic and Reconstructive Surgery. On this episode we discuss preventative measures, misconceptions around plastic surgery, finding individual healthy balances when it comes to procedures, hyper pigmentation, fat transfers, facial hair and ethics between surgeons.

To connect with Dr. Kay click HERE
